name: The Way of the Exploding Foot
overview: Raphael-San and Mathis-San are two boys seeking a mysterious ancient wisdom that can transcend the mind and body. They traveled the world before meeting the wise Yu-Ki who decided to teach them the mythic way of the exploding foot. Now both of them train in this martial art under the aegis of their spiritual master. Become a master of this mysterious ancient art: Test your strength and discipline and progress to become a true karateka. You control your character with Control Stick - 16 different maneuvers including blocks, flying kicks, legsweeps, round-house, and somersaults! Challenge the computer, facing opponents of progressively greater skill or compete with a friend.
